comments:
I tried to open a file when I mistyped something. I'll try to reproduce.

If I can't provide more information and the exception below is not effective in immediately finding the problem, please feel free to close this PR.

Created an attachment (id=40690)
Fix for NPE.

I could reproduce this problem with CDT 3.1 HEAD by opening a writable external C/C++ file via File > Open... and pressing CTRL+O.
Thanks Toni, I have applied the patch.
